metadata.synopsis: Dialog when the player interacts with the Karabasan's Gift Poisoned wine and the investigation check passes.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Interactuate and pass the Investigation skill-check with Karabasan's Gift. The poison is in multiple situations (Murderer Lair, Highberry's House, Figaro's and Hag Survivors Support Group).Relevant flags in this page: https://larianstudios.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/GUS/pages/2624159852/Lower+City+Debug+Commands

0.speaker: Player
0.text: This wine... It's poison. Some sort of paralytic agent.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: I recognise this wine. It's a paralysing poison...
